reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: Psychosocial Skills Support for MECA Region Projects

description.narrative: A dental clinic for Herat University dental faculty students is already established and they will get improved training through academic exchange program. School children will be examined and free treatment provided for them in the clinic. The children wil l be taught about dental hygiene in schools and will be granted a dental hygiene kit. Data from the school children program will be incorporated into research about the dental health in the Herat region. Afghanistan has only 0,29 dental professionals per 1 0 000 people and there is little awareness of dental health. Teeth are simply pulled out when there are problems. Herat University's dental faculty has just been opened and is one of the few dental faculties in the country. The goal of the project is impro vement of dental health in Herat province, and the purpose is improvement of dental health services in Herat province. Fida?s partner for the project is Shelter Now which is an INGO and has experience in working in Afghanistan since 1998. 4000 children wil l be taught dental hygiene and 3000 school children and 2500 other people will be treated. Dental clinic facilities have been improved already and dental health info will be given to 40 clinics. Dental faculty staff will also receive training. Quantitative data from 2000 children will be given to stakeholders and the dental work ethics will be improved.
